overview:
Sean Aggarwal is Chief Financial Officer at Trulia. He was formerly a vice-president at eBay. In his seven years with eBay he was part of teams that have led eBay’s expansion into new countries in Europe and Asia, completed over a dozen M&A transactions, and brought new products to market. He also held various finance roles at the company including CFO of US Categories and vice-president at PayPal.

Prior to eBay, Sean was at Amazon.com. He joined Amazon in the early stage of its growth and was part of the management team that took Amazon’s US business from a few hundred million to $4 billion in sales.

He also spent several years in strategy and finance at PepsiCo. He has served as CFO of a mobile internet start-up in Silicon Valley and was the founder and CEO of an enterprise software start-up. Sean started his career as an investment banker with Merrill Lynch in New York. He earned an MBA from Northwestern University.
